nhc_headline: ...HURRICANE HUNTERS FIND BERYL SLIGHTLY STRONGER... ...DANGEROUS STORM SURGE, FLASH FLOODING, AND STRONG WINDS EXPECTED  OVERNIGHT IN PORTIONS OF TEXAS...
summary:
...HURRICANE HUNTERS FIND BERYL SLIGHTLY STRONGER... ...DANGEROUS STORM SURGE, FLASH FLOODING, AND STRONG WINDS EXPECTED  OVERNIGHT IN PORTIONS OF TEXAS...
 As of 7:00 PM CDT Sun Jul 7
 the center of Beryl was located near 27.1, -95.6
 with movement NNW at 12 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 987 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 70 mph.
